summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing extension of an agreement with the League of Cities/ Conference of Mayors, Inc., for a grant to continue funding the Seattle Veterans Action Program (Grant Number 30073-F-72-01), and in connection therewith establishing certain positions in the Executive Department and increasing certain allowances in the 1972 Budget of the Executive Department, Division of Veterans Affairs by reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
